Index.title: GrainChain
Index.subtitle: Blockchain-powered supply chain transparency for agricultural products
Index.description: Track your food from farm to table with complete transparency and security
Index.heroSubtitle: Blockchain-powered supply chain transparency for agricultural products. From seed to shelf, track every step with trust and transparency.
Index.featureBlockchainDescription: All data is securely stored on the blockchain, ensuring immutability and trust.
Index.featureTransparencyDescription: Full visibility into every step of the supply chain from farm to table.
Index.featureScanningDescription: Instant QR code scanning to access product information.
Index.featureRealtimeDescription: Live tracking and status updates throughout the supply chain.
Index.stepFarmerDescription: Farmers register their produce and generate unique QR codes.
Index.stepDistributorDescription: Distributors update logistics and track products.
Index.stepRetailerDescription: Retailers confirm arrival, assess quality, and set pricing.
Index.stepConsumerDescription: Consumers scan QR codes to verify authenticity.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: The complete GrainChain supply chain process

1.title: Farmer Registration
1.description: Farmers register their produce with detailed information and generate unique QR codes

2.title: Distribution Tracking
2.description: Distributors update logistics and track products through the supply chain

3.title: Retail Confirmation
3.description: Retailers confirm arrival, assess quality, and set final pricing

4.title: Consumer Verification
4.description: Consumers scan QR codes to verify authenticity and trace the complete journey

keyFeatures.title: Key Features
keyFeatures.description: Why choose GrainChain for supply chain transparency

1.title: Blockchain Security
1.description: All data is securely stored on the blockchain, ensuring immutability and trust

2.title: Complete Transparency
2.description: Full visibility into every step of the supply chain from farm to table

3.title: Easy QR Scanning
3.description: Simple QR code scanning for instant access to product information

4.title: Real-time Updates
4.description: Live tracking and status updates throughout the supply chain journey

Farmer.farmerHome: Register your produce and make it immutable
Farmer.title: Farmer Portal
Farmer.registerDescription: Enter the details of your produce to register it on the blockchain
Farmer.liveQRCodeDescription: QR code updates in real-time as you fill the form
Farmer.successMessage: Produce registered successfully! QR code generated.

FarmerSuccess.title: Registration Successful!
FarmerSuccess.produceRegisteredDescription: Your produce has been successfully registered on the blockchain
FarmerSuccess.saveQRCode: Save this QR code and attach it to your produce packaging
FarmerSuccess.qrCodeInfo: This QR code contains all the information about your produce. Distributors, retailers, and consumers can scan it to verify the authenticity and track the journey of your produce through the supply chain.

Distributor.title: Distributor Portal
Distributor.updateStatusDescription: Update the logistics status and location of produce in transit
Distributor.additionalNotesPlaceholder: Any additional information about the shipment

DistributorSuccess.title: Status Update Successful!
DistributorSuccess.logisticsUpdatedDescription: The produce status has been successfully updated on the blockchain
DistributorSuccess.blockchainConfirmationDescription: This status update has been permanently recorded on the blockchain and cannot be altered. All stakeholders can now verify the current location and status of this produce.
nextStepsItems: Continue monitoring the produce as it moves through the supply chain
Update the status whenever the produce reaches a new location
Notify the next stakeholder when the produce is ready for handover
All updates are transparent and verifiable on the blockchain

Retailer.title: Retailer Portal - Confirm Arrival & Set Price
Retailer.confirmArrivalDescription: Confirm the arrival of produce and set the retail price
priceSettingGuidelinesItems: Consider the quality and condition of the produce
Factor in transportation and storage costs
Research current market prices for similar products
Set a competitive but profitable price
Retailer.successMessage: Produce arrival confirmed and price set!

RetailerSuccess.title: üéâ Complete Journey - Ready for Consumers!
RetailerSuccess.finalJourneyQRCodeDescription: Complete supply chain data in one scan
RetailerSuccess.produceJourneyCompleteDescription: The produce has successfully traveled through the entire supply chain
RetailerSuccess.blockchainVerificationCompleteDescriptio: This complete journey has been permanently recorded on the blockchain. Every step from farm to retail is now verifiable and transparent.
RetailerSuccess.readyForConsumersDescription: Display the final QR code prominently so consumers can scan and verify the complete journey of their food product.
RetailerSuccess.errorMessage: Unable to load produce data. Please try again.

Consumer.title: Consumer Portal - Trace Your Food
Consumer.scanQRCodeDescription: Scan the QR code on the product packaging to trace its journey
Consumer.scanButtonDescription: Click the button below to start scanning and discover the complete journey of your food
Consumer.farmToTableDescription: Trace the complete journey from farm to your table
Consumer.blockchainVerifiedDescription: All information is securely stored on the blockchain
Consumer.fullTransparencyDescription: See every step of the supply chain in real-time
Consumer.scanningDescription: Point your camera at the QR code on the product packaging
Consumer.cameraError: Camera access denied or not available
Consumer.productJourneyDescription: Complete traceability from farm to table
Consumer.blockchainVerificationDetail: All the information displayed above has been verified and stored on the blockchain. This ensures the data is authentic, tamper-proof, and transparent. You can trust that this product has been through a verified supply chain.
